abstract: The class action lawsuit asserts that a planned digital library amounts to large-scale copyright infringement.
snippet: The class action lawsuit asserts that a planned digital library amounts to large-scale copyright infringement.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — As Google awaits approval of a controversial settlement with authors and book publishers, the company’s plan to create an immense digital library and bookstore may face yet another hurdle.

headline.main: Visual Artists to Sue Google Over Vast Library Project
headline.print_headline: Visual Artists to Sue Google Over Vast Library Project
